name: Luminance
tagline: A Philips Hue client for Linux written in Python and GTK+.
body: Luminance is a client for the [Philips Hue](http://meethue.com) lighting system. Its aim is to be beautiful and easy to use yet offer all of the functionality that the Hue system has to offer. ## Installation If you're just looking to use Luminance, you'll want to install from distribution packages. Currently, Luminance is available from the following distributions: * None yet, AUR package will be available shortly ### Problems If you are having a problem, please [report an issue](https://github.com/craigcabrey/luminance/issues) detailing your environment as much as possible (Distribution, Python version, GTK version, traceback if any, etc). ### Contributing Pull requests are always welcome. Head over to the [GitHub](https://github.com/craigcabrey/luminance) to get started.
